page.title: 10CATON ROAD DEVELOPMENT II
page.content: The Special Planning Group in Lancaster (a subsidiary of Lancaster Council) have been working to build this cycle path.They have used funds from the Water Authority,British Waterways and Goverment Agencies to do this.Fishermen are also encouraged to use the path as jetties are being provided for their use.The latest development is the building of a jetty in Lancaster for the use of disabled fishermen.Future plans of the Group are a cafe,toilets, and maybe a cycle hire shop.The traveller coming into Lancaster from the direction of the motorway will notice first of all the new "Post House Hotel,(Trust House Forte)on the right and then,still on the right hand side,factories,warehouse units and derilict sites.On the opposite side of the road there are houses and a social club and golf course.
